name: DICOM_AFFECTED_INS
description: Table to contain instance-related information when the Modality Performed Procedure Step (MPPS) sends a procedure begin status update.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AFFECTED_INST
columns.description: ID of the affected DICOM instance. This is set when the Modality Performed Procedure Step (MPPS) sends a procedure begin status update.
